channel.title: A possible website for innovative product ideas
channel.description:
People often ask about where to get ideas for products. On this website companies are offering money for solutions:
https://www.innocentive.com/ar/challenge/browse
That is pretty good market validation! However they are also mostly 'bleeding edge' problems, so a bit of a long shot.
